org.apereo.cas.authentication

类 AuthenticationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.apereo.cas.authentication.AuthenticationException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    PrincipalException, UnauthorizedAuthenticationException

    public class AuthenticationException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Authentication raised by AuthenticationManager to signal authentication failure. Authentication failure typically occurs when one or more AuthenticationHandler components fail to authenticate credentials. This exception contains information about handler successes and failures that may be used by higher-level components to determine subsequent behavior.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0.0
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AuthenticationException()
      Instantiates a new Authentication exception.
      AuthenticationException(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors)
      Creates a new instance for the case when no handlers succeeded.
      AuthenticationException(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> handlerSuccesses)
      Creates a new instance for the case when there are both handler successes and failures.
      AuthenticationException(java.lang.String msg)
      Creates a new instance for the case when no handlers were attempted, i.e. no successes or failures.
      AuthenticationException(java.lang.String message, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> handlerSuccesses)
      Creates a new instance for the case when there are both handler successes and failures and a custom error message is required.

      Gets an unmodifiable map of handler names to errors.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> getHandlerSuccesses()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AuthenticationException

        public AuthenticationException(java.lang.String msg)
        Creates a new instance for the case when no handlers were attempted, i.e. no successes or failures.
        参数:
        msg - the msg

      • AuthenticationException

        public AuthenticationException()
        Instantiates a new Authentication exception.

      • AuthenticationException

        public AuthenticationException(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors)
        Creates a new instance for the case when no handlers succeeded.
        参数:
        handlerErrors - Map of handler names to errors.

      • AuthenticationException

        public AuthenticationException(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> handlerSuccesses)
        Creates a new instance for the case when there are both handler successes and failures.
        参数:
        handlerErrors - Map of handler names to errors.
        handlerSuccesses - Map of handler names to authentication successes.

      • AuthenticationException

        public AuthenticationException(java.lang.String message,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> handlerErrors,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> handlerSuccesses)
        Creates a new instance for the case when there are both handler successes and failures and a custom error message is required.
        参数:
        message - the message associated with this error.
        handlerErrors - Map of handler names to errors.
        handlerSuccesses - Map of handler names to authentication successes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getHandlerErrors

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> getHandlerErrors()
        Gets an unmodifiable map of handler names to errors.
        返回:
        Immutable map of handler names to errors.

      • getHandlerSuccesses

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HandlerResult> getHandlerSuccesses()
        Gets an unmodifiable map of handler names to authentication successes.
        返回:
        Immutable map of handler names to authentication successes.
